name: Vcare Tec
tag_list: bpo-services, contact-center-solutions, offshore-call-centers, call-center-outsourcing, call-answering-services, billing-and-oss-provider, data-analytics-service-provider, telecom-billing-services, ivr-solution-providers, it-support-services, technical-su
description: Vcare Tec - Cisco Based Contact Center
overview:
Vcare Tec :- Headquartered in Seattle, Washington, Vcare Tec is one of the prominent BPO companies with its wide delivery networks spread across the world. For more than a decade the company has been offering end-to- end customer centric services to its overseas clients with its innovative technology and Cisco powered IP network.

What We Do :- With a proven expertise in the domain of IT enabled services, Vcare Tec excels in offering high-end BPO services along with Telecom Bill and OSS solutions. Apart from this, it also offers a myriad of value added services like, Contact Center Solution, Data Analytics Services, IT services, Free Queuing & Intelligent Routing, Advanced IVR services, etc.

What services We Offer :- Being one of the pre-eminent BPO companies of the world, the services offered by Vcare remain unrivalled. Its principal offerings include:

• BPO Services

o Call Center solutions o Back office support o Technical support

• IT support

o Software Development o Interactive Voice Response Services o Infrastructure Management

• Data Analytics Services

o F & A Outsourcing o Email /Chat Support o Research Activities

• Value Added Services consists of:

o Free Queuing & Intelligent Routing o Advanced IVR services o Customer Relationship Management o KPO services

• Telecom Billing and OSS solutions

What Modules it consists: Vcare Tec being the one stop hub for all you telecom billing and OSS support consists of different module. Viz,: o Lifeline ETC Module: This module provides for validation of addresses and credentials, duplicate checks, 497 reporting and a lot more. o Activation Module: Activation module enables subscribers to sign up quickly in our system. o Agent Portal: This module enables the agents to get their quick performance update over the internet. o Billing Module: This module enables mailing of e-bills depending on dates and anniversaries. It is also integrated with some of the major payment gateways. o Inventory Module : Vcare’s inventory module enables the users to accomplish orders on a first in first out basis. o Data Analytics & Reporting: This module allows preparing of various like, reports sales report, agent performance tracking report, etc. o CSR Module: CSR module helps you to know your customer well.
